trans-unit.target: 冷漠的阿士诺

trans-unit.resname: BRC·4 | Ashnod the Uncaring | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Deathtouch\nWhenever you activate an ability of an artifact or creature that isn't a mana ability, if one or more permanents were sacrificed to activate it, you may copy that ability. You may choose new targets for the copy. (Sacrificing an artifact for mana to activate an ability doesn't count.)
trans-unit.target: 死触 每当你起动神器或生物的异能，且其不为法术力异能时，若牺牲了一个或数个永久物来起动，则你可以复制该异能。你可以为该复制品选择新的目标。（因产生起动异能所需之法术力而牺牲的神器不属此类。）

trans-unit.resname: BRC·21 | Disciple of Caelus Nin | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Disciple of Caelus Nin
trans-unit.target: 凯路忍信徒

trans-unit.resname: BRC·21 | Disciple of Caelus Nin | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, starting with you, each player chooses up to five permanents they control. All permanents other than CARDNAME that weren't chosen this way phase out.\nPermanents can't phase in.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，由你开始，每位牌手各选择至多五个由其操控的永久物。所有未以此法选中的永久物跃离，但CARDNAME除外。 永久物都不能跃回。

trans-unit.resname: BRC·22 | The Brothers' War | Card Name
trans-unit.source: The Brothers' War
trans-unit.target: 兄弟之战

trans-unit.resname: BRC·22 | The Brothers' War | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source:
(As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)
I — Create two tapped Powerstone tokens.
II — Choose two target players. Until your next turn, each creature they control attacks the other chosen player each combat if able.
III — CARDNAME deals X damage to any target and X damage to any other target, where X is the number of artifacts you control.
trans-unit.target: （于此传纪进战场时及于你抓牌步骤后，加一个学问指示物。到III后牺牲之。） I — 派出两个已横置的魔力石衍生物。 II — 选择两位目标牌手。对每个由这些牌手操控的生物而言，直到你的下一个回合，该生物每次战斗若能攻击另一位所选牌手，则必须如此攻击。 III — CARDNAME对任意一个目标造成X点伤害，且对任意另一个目标造成X点伤害，X为由你操控的神器数量。

trans-unit.resname: BRC·23 | Sardian Avenger | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Sardian Avenger
trans-unit.target: 沙地亚复仇者

trans-unit.resname: BRC·23 | Sardian Avenger | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: First strike, trample\nWhenever CARDNAME attacks, it gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the number of artifacts your opponents control.\nWhenever an artifact an opponent controls is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, CARDNAME deals 1 damage to that player.
trans-unit.target: 先攻，践踏 每当CARDNAME攻击时，它得+X/+0直到回合结束，X为由所有对手操控的神器数量。 每当一个由对手操控的神器从战场进入坟墓场时，CARDNAME对该牌手造成1点伤害。

trans-unit.resname: BRC·24 | Rootpath Purifier | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Rootpath Purifier
trans-unit.target: 根径涤净师

trans-unit.resname: BRC·24 | Rootpath Purifier | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Lands you control and land cards in your library are basic.
trans-unit.target: 由你操控的地和你牌库中的地牌都是基本。

trans-unit.resname: BRC·24 | Rootpath Purifier | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Holiness is not found in a druid's words, or even the rituals of Titania's court. It is found here, in the mud, where Gaea bares her soul, unshackled by ceremony."
trans-unit.target: 「圣恩并非存于德鲁伊的祷告之中，甚至不见于泰坦尼亚教廷仪式。它正蕴于此处，土地泥壤便是盖亚显灵之所：她随性而来，不受缛节束缚。」

trans-unit.resname: BRC·25 | Titania, Nature's Force | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Titania, Nature's Force
trans-unit.target: 自然之力泰坦尼亚

trans-unit.resname: BRC·25 | Titania, Nature's Force | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: You may play Forests from your graveyard.\nWhenever a Forest enters the battlefield under your control, create a 5/3 green Elemental creature token.\nWhenever an Elemental you control dies, you may mill three cards.
trans-unit.target: 你可以从你的坟墓场中使用树林。 每当一个树林在你的操控下进战场时，派出一个5/3绿色元素衍生生物。 每当一个由你操控的元素死去时，你可以磨三张牌。

trans-unit.resname: BRC·26 | The Archimandrite | Card Name
trans-unit.source: The Archimandrite
trans-unit.target: 至尊掌院

trans-unit.resname: BRC·26 | The Archimandrite | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, you gain X life, where X is the number of cards in your hand minus 4.\nWhenever you gain life, each Advisor, Artificer, and Monk you control gains vigilance and gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the amount of life you gained.\nTap three untapped Advisors, Artificers, and/or Monks you control: Draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，你获得X点生命，X为你的手牌数量减4。 每当你获得生命时，直到回合结束，每个由你操控的参谋、神器师和修行僧均获得警戒异能且得+X/+0，X为你所获得的生命数量。 横置三个由你操控且未横置的参谋，神器师和／或修行僧：抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: BRC·28 | Urza's Workshop | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Urza eventually came to understand Tocasia's lessons on clarity of purpose. Perfection became his goal, and all other matters fell away in its pursuit.
trans-unit.target: 托卡西雅曾反复强调要有明确目标，而克撒如今终于理解此般教诲的意义所在。他的眼中只剩完美二字，且为此目标他可以抛却一切。

trans-unit.source: As long as an artifact creature you control is attacking, prevent all damage that would be dealt to CARDNAME.\nWhenever Sanwell becomes tapped, exile the top six cards of your library. You may cast a Vehicle or artifact creature spell from among them. Then put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
trans-unit.target: 只要任一由你操控的神器生物正进行攻击，便防止将对CARDNAME造成的所有伤害。 每当山威尔成为横置时，放逐你牌库顶的六张牌。你可以从其中施放一个载具或神器生物咒语。然后将其余的牌以随机顺序置于你牌库底。

If an opponent controls more lands than you, you may put that card onto the battlefield tapped. If you don't put the card onto the battlefield, put it into your hand. Then shuffle.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME进战场时上面有一个+1/+1指示物。 {T}，从由你操控的永久物上移去一个指示物：从你的牌库中搜寻一张平原牌并展示之。如果某对手操控的地比你多，则你可以将该牌横置放进战场。如果你未将该牌放进战场，则将它置于你手上。然后洗牌。

Put an artifact card revealed this way into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 CARDNAME得+X/+0，X为由你操控之神器中的最大法术力值。 每当CARDNAME对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，你可以从你的牌库顶展示等量的牌。将以此法展示出的一张神器牌置于你手上，其余则置入你的坟墓场。

trans-unit.source: {5}, {T}: Each opponent loses 2 life. This ability costs {1} less to activate for each creature card in your graveyard.
trans-unit.target: {5}，{T}：每位对手各失去2点生命。你坟墓场中每有一张生物牌，此异能便减少{1}来起动。

trans-unit.resname: BRO·86 | Battlefield Butcher | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Any more giant metal monsters want to try their luck? I'm just getting warmed up!"
trans-unit.target: 「还有哪个大铁家伙想要来试试运气吗？我这才刚热身呢！」

trans-unit.resname: BRO·87 | Carrion Locust | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Carrion Locust
trans-unit.target: 腐肉蝗虫

trans-unit.resname: BRO·87 | Carrion Locust | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, exile target card from an opponent's graveyard. If it was a creature card, that player loses 1 life.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 当CARDNAME进战场时，将目标牌从对手的坟墓场放逐。若它是生物牌，则该牌手失去1点生命。

trans-unit.resname: BRO·87 | Carrion Locust | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: No honor. No glory. No leftovers.
trans-unit.target: 绝不光彩。绝不光荣。绝不剩余。

trans-unit.resname: BRO·88 | Corrupt | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Corrupt
trans-unit.target: 腐化

trans-unit.resname: BRO·88 | Corrupt | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME deals damage to any target equal to the number of Swamps you control. You gain life equal to the damage dealt this way.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME对任意一个目标造成伤害，其数量等同于由你操控的沼泽数量。你获得等同于以此法所造成的伤害之生命。

trans-unit.resname: BRO·88 | Corrupt | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Most wise, most thoughtful, most powerful qadir," said the Gixian, "we offer whatever help we may give in your illustrious name."
trans-unit.target: 「最睿智，最博学，最伟大的族长，」基克斯派教徒说道，「承您盛名，我们会献上您要的任何助力。」

trans-unit.resname: BRO·89 | Diabolic Intent | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Diabolic Intent
trans-unit.target: 恶魔意图

trans-unit.resname: BRO·89 | Diabolic Intent | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.\nSearch your library for a card, put that card into your hand, then shuffle.
trans-unit.target: 牺牲一个生物，以作为施放此咒语的额外费用。 从你牌库中搜寻一张牌，将该牌置于你手上，然后洗牌。

trans-unit.resname: BRO·89 | Diabolic Intent | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Gix pierced his disciples' minds and savored their experiences as he took in their knowledge.
trans-unit.target: 基克斯刺穿信徒思维，吸取经历，获取所知。

trans-unit.resname: BRO·90 | Disciples of Gix | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Disciples of Gix
trans-unit.target: 基克斯的信徒

trans-unit.resname: BRO·90 | Disciples of Gix | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, search your library for up to three artifact cards, put them into your graveyard, then shuffle.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，从你牌库中搜寻至多三张神器牌，将它们置入你的坟墓场，然后洗牌。

trans-unit.resname: BRO·90 | Disciples of Gix | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Machines feel no fear, no sorrow, no hunger—only glorious purpose, true and pure."
trans-unit.target: 「机械毫无恐惧，从未伤悲，不知饥渴～眼中只有荣光使命，真诚而纯粹。」

trans-unit.resname: BRO·91 | Disfigure | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Disfigure
trans-unit.target: 毁容

trans-unit.resname: BRO·91 | Disfigure | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 目标生物得-2/-2直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: BRO·91 | Disfigure | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: With a snap of metal like a strike of lightning, the tide of war shifted in Mishra's favor.
trans-unit.target: 随着雷鸣般的金属碎裂之声，战局瞬间倒向米斯拉一方。

trans-unit.resname: BRO·92 | Dreams of Steel and Oil | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Dreams of Steel and Oil
trans-unit.target: 钢油幻梦

trans-unit.resname: BRO·92 | Dreams of Steel and Oil | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose an artifact or creature card from it, then choose an artifact or creature card from their graveyard. Exile the chosen cards.
trans-unit.target: 目标对手展示其手牌。你选择其中一张神器或生物牌，然后选择其坟墓场中一张神器或生物牌。放逐所选之牌。

trans-unit.resname: BRO·92 | Dreams of Steel and Oil | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Mishra's nightmares of Phyrexia rang with screams of agony and groans of twisted metal. The sounds stayed with him long after he awoke.
trans-unit.target: 米斯拉关于非瑞克西亚的梦魇之中，总是充斥着苦痛折磨的尖鸣与金属扭曲的啸响。就算清醒之后，此等声音仍在其脑中萦绕不散。

trans-unit.resname: BRO·93 | Emergency Weld | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Emergency Weld
trans-unit.target: 紧急熔焊

trans-unit.resname: BRO·93 | Emergency Weld | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Return target artifact or creature card from your graveyard to your hand. Create a 1/1 colorless Soldier artifact creature token.
trans-unit.target: 将目标神器或生物牌从你的坟墓场移回你手上。派出一个1/1无色士兵衍生神器生物。

trans-unit.resname: BRO·93 | Emergency Weld | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Scurrying repair bots quietly turned the tide of many battles, patching damaged automatons back into fighting form.
trans-unit.target: 迅捷维修械能够快速整修受损机械，令其恢复作战能力，从而悄然扭转战局。

trans-unit.resname: BRO·94 | Fateful Handoff | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Fateful Handoff
trans-unit.target: 宿命交接

trans-unit.resname: BRO·94 | Fateful Handoff | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Draw cards equal to the mana value of target artifact or creature you control. An opponent gains control of that permanent.
trans-unit.target: 抓若干牌，其数量等同于目标由你操控之神器或生物的法术力值。任一对手获得该永久物的操控权。

trans-unit.resname: BRO·94 | Fateful Handoff | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Get the sylex to Urza at any cost. Tell him to fill it with memories of the land."\n—Ashnod, to Tawnos
trans-unit.target: 「把同兆交给克撒，不计代价。叫他在里面装满大地的回忆。」 ～阿士诺嘱咐达硌士

trans-unit.resname: BRO·95 | Gix, Yawgmoth Praetor | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Gix, Yawgmoth Praetor

trans-unit.resname: BRO·95 | Gix, Yawgmoth Praetor | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Whenever a creature deals combat damage to one of your opponents, its controller may pay 1 life. If they do, they draw a card.\n{4}{B}{B}{B}, Discard X cards: Exile the top X cards of target opponent's library. You may play lands and cast spells from among cards exiled this way without paying their mana costs.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个生物向你的任一对手造成战斗伤害时，其操控者可以支付1点生命。若其如此作，则其抓一张牌。 {4}{B}{B}{B}，弃X张牌：放逐目标对手牌库顶的X张牌。你可以从以此法放逐的牌之中使用地和施放咒语，且不需支付其法术力费用。

trans-unit.resname: BRO·96 | Gix's Caress | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 基克斯的抚慰

trans-unit.resname: BRO·96 | Gix's Caress | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card.\nCreate a tapped Powerstone token. (It's an artifact with "{T}: Add {C}. This mana can't be spent to cast a nonartifact spell.")
trans-unit.target: 目标对手展示其手牌。你选择其中一张非地牌。该牌手弃掉该牌。 派出一个已横置的魔力石衍生物。（它是具有「{T}：加{C}。此法术力不能用来施放非神器咒语」的神器。）

trans-unit.resname: BRO·96 | Gix's Caress | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Show me all the delicious misery you've sown."
trans-unit.target: 「让我看看你经历的美味伤悲。」

trans-unit.resname: BRO·97 | Gix's Command | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Gix's Command
trans-unit.target: 基克斯的指命

trans-unit.resname: BRO·97 | Gix's Command | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source:
Choose two —
• Put two +1/+1 counters on up to one creature. It gains lifelink until end of turn.
• Destroy each creature with power 2 or less.
• Return up to two creature cards from your graveyard to your hand.
• Each opponent sacrifices a creature with the highest power among creatures they control.
trans-unit.target: 选择两项～ •在至多一个生物上放置两个+1/+1指示物。它获得系命异能直到回合结束。 •消灭所有力量等于或小于2的生物。 •将至多两张生物牌从你的坟墓场移回你手上。 •每位对手各牺牲一个生物，且须是由其操控的生物中力量最大者。

trans-unit.resname: BRO·98 | Gixian Infiltrator | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Gixian Infiltrator
trans-unit.target: 基克斯派渗透者

trans-unit.resname: BRO·98 | Gixian Infiltrator | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever you sacrifice another permanent, put a +1/+1 counter on CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 每当你牺牲另一个永久物时，在CARDNAME上放置一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.resname: BRO·98 | Gixian Infiltrator | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Terisia City's fall is inevitable. My master's plan runs as sure and steady as the oil in my veins."
trans-unit.target: 「泰瑞西亚城陷落只是时间问题。主人的计划平稳而顺利，正如我血脉中流淌的烁油一般。」

trans-unit.resname: BRO·99 | Gixian Puppeteer | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Gixian Puppeteer
trans-unit.target: 基克斯派控偶师

trans-unit.resname: BRO·99 | Gixian Puppeteer | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Whenever you draw your second card each turn, each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.\nWhen CARDNAME dies, return another target creature card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: 每当你抓每回合中你的第二张牌时，每位对手各失去2点生命且你获得2点生命。 当CARDNAME死去时，将另一张目标法术力值等于或小于3的生物牌从你坟墓场移回战场。

trans-unit.resname: BRO·99 | Gixian Puppeteer | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: To some, desecration. To Gix, decoration.
trans-unit.target: 对别人来说，这是亵渎圣物。对基克斯来说，这是增效神物。

trans-unit.resname: BRO·100 | Gixian Skullflayer | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Gixian Skullflayer
trans-unit.target: 基克斯派掠颅客

trans-unit.resname: BRO·100 | Gixian Skullflayer | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, if there are three or more creature cards in your graveyard, put a +1/+1 counter on CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，若你坟墓场中有三张或更多生物牌，则在CARDNAME上放置一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.resname: BRO·100 | Gixian Skullflayer | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "With every culling, we bring this world closer to *compleation*."
trans-unit.target: 「每杀一人，就令世界离*完化*更进一步。」

trans-unit.resname: BRO·101 | Gnawing Vermin | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Gnawing Vermin
trans-unit.target: 啮食病媒

trans-unit.resname: BRO·101 | Gnawing Vermin | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, target player mills two cards.\nWhen CARDNAME dies, target creature you don't control gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，目标牌手磨两张牌。 当CARDNAME死去时，目标不由你操控的生物得-1/-1直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: BRO·101 | Gnawing Vermin | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Everyone warns about the sand and the food, but the rats are worse than both put together!"\n—Sanwell, letter to his family
trans-unit.target: 「所有人都提醒我沙暴肆虐、食物糟糕；但老鼠比这两者加起来还要难缠！」 ～山威尔家书

trans-unit.resname: BRO·102 | Go for the Throat | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Go for the Throat
trans-unit.target: 直刺咽喉

trans-unit.resname: BRO·102 | Go for the Throat | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Destroy target nonartifact creature.
trans-unit.target: 消灭目标非神器的生物。

trans-unit.resname: BRO·102 | Go for the Throat | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: When Titania offered peace, Urza merely turned her down. Mishra made her people pay for the insult.
trans-unit.target: 当泰坦尼亚提议收兵时，克撒只不过言辞上加以拒绝。而米斯拉则以行动令她的子民为此等羞辱付出代价。

trans-unit.resname: BRO·103 | Gruesome Realization | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Gruesome Realization
trans-unit.target: 恶心实化

trans-unit.resname: BRO·103 | Gruesome Realization | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Choose one —\n• You draw two cards and you lose 2 life.\n• Creatures your opponents control get -1/-1 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 选择一项～ •你抓两张牌且失去2点生命。 •由对手操控的生物得-1/-1直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: BRO·103 | Gruesome Realization | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Mishra was gone—all that remained was a machine wearing his face.
trans-unit.target: 米斯拉已一去不返～剩下的不过是一尊长着相同面庞的机器。

trans-unit.resname: BRO·104 | Gurgling Anointer | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Gurgling Anointer
trans-unit.target: 骇笑赐圣兽

trans-unit.resname: BRO·104 | Gurgling Anointer | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhenever you draw your second card each turn, put a +1/+1 counter on CARDNAME.\nWhen CARDNAME dies, return another target creature card with mana value less than or equal to CARDNAME's power from your graveyard to the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 每当你抓每回合中你的第二张牌时，在CARDNAME上放置一个+1/+1指示物。 当CARDNAME死去时，将另一张目标法术力值等于或小于CARDNAME力量的生物牌从你坟墓场移回战场。

trans-unit.resname: BRO·105 | Hostile Negotiations | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Hostile Negotiations
trans-unit.target: 敌意谈判

trans-unit.resname: BRO·105 | Hostile Negotiations | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Exile the top three cards of your library in a face-down pile, then exile the top three cards of your library in another face-down pile. Look at the cards in each pile, then turn a pile of your choice face up. An opponent chooses one of those piles. Put all cards in the chosen pile into your hand and the rest into your graveyard. You lose 3 life.
trans-unit.target: 放逐你牌库顶的三张牌并牌面朝下地放作一堆，然后放逐你牌库顶的三张牌并牌面朝下地放作另一堆。检视各牌堆的牌，然后选择一堆并将其翻为牌面朝上。由任一对手选择其中一堆。将该堆牌置于你手上，另一堆则置入你的坟墓场。你失去3点生命。

trans-unit.resname: BRO·106 | Kill-Zone Acrobat | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Kill-Zone Acrobat
trans-unit.target: 交战地带舞者

trans-unit.resname: BRO·106 | Kill-Zone Acrobat | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME attacks, you may sacrifice another creature or artifact. If you do, CARDNAME gains flying until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME攻击时，你可以牺牲另一个生物或神器。若你如此作，则CARDNAME获得飞行异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: BRO·106 | Kill-Zone Acrobat | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Her circus training proved surprisingly valuable on the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: 她曾在马戏团中受训，结果证明此等经历在战场上格外有用。

trans-unit.resname: BRO·107 | Misery's Shadow | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Misery's Shadow
trans-unit.target: 苦痛阴影

trans-unit.resname: BRO·107 | Misery's Shadow | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: If a creature an opponent controls would die, exile it instead.\n{1}: CARDNAME gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 如果某个由对手操控的生物将死去，则改为将它放逐。 {1}：CARDNAME得+1/+1直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: BRO·107 | Misery's Shadow | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: In the ruins of Kroog, only anguish thrived.
trans-unit.target: 在萼城废墟中，唯有悲痛还不断增长。

trans-unit.resname: BRO·108 | Moment of Defiance | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Moment of Defiance
trans-unit.target: 反抗时刻

trans-unit.resname: BRO·108 | Moment of Defiance | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Target creature gets +2/+1 and gains lifelink until end of turn.\nDraw a card.
trans-unit.target: 直到回合结束，目标生物得+2/+1且获得系命异能。 抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: BRO·108 | Moment of Defiance | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Well? What are you waiting for? Let's not keep the buzzards waiting."
trans-unit.target: 「喂？你还在等什么？别浪费兀鹰时间。」

trans-unit.resname: BRO·109 | No One Left Behind | Card Name
trans-unit.source: No One Left Behind
trans-unit.target: 不弃同袍

trans-unit.resname: BRO·109 | No One Left Behind | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: This spell costs {3} less to cast if it targets a creature card with mana value 3 or less.\nReturn target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: 如果此咒语以法术力值等于或小于3的生物牌为目标，则减少{3}来施放。 将目标生物牌从你的坟墓场移回战场。

trans-unit.resname: BRO·109 | No One Left Behind | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Dying for the cause is overrated.
trans-unit.target: 英勇赴死只是虚高气节。

trans-unit.resname: BRO·110 | Overwhelming Remorse | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Overwhelming Remorse
trans-unit.target: 过度自责

trans-unit.resname: BRO·110 | Overwhelming Remorse | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each creature card in your graveyard.\nExile target creature or planeswalker.
trans-unit.target: 你坟墓场中每有一张生物牌，此咒语便减少{1}来施放。 放逐目标生物或鹏洛客。

trans-unit.resname: BRO·110 | Overwhelming Remorse | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Tocasia's face haunted his vision. The explosion still rung in his ears. Mishra kept running and never once looked back.
trans-unit.target: 他的眼前浮现出托卡西雅的面庞。他的耳边萦绕着隆隆爆炸声响。米斯拉埋头奔行，从未回头。

trans-unit.resname: BRO·111 | Painful Quandary | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Painful Quandary
trans-unit.target: 痛苦窘境

trans-unit.resname: BRO·111 | Painful Quandary | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever an opponent casts a spell, that player loses 5 life unless they discard a card.
trans-unit.target: 每当任一对手施放咒语时，除非该牌手弃一张牌，否则其失去5点生命。

trans-unit.resname: BRO·111 | Painful Quandary | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: In Mishra's desperation to destroy his brother, he allowed Gix to destroy him instead.
trans-unit.target: 米斯拉不惜代价想要击败兄长，于是便放任基克斯毁灭自己作最终一搏。

trans-unit.resname: BRO·112 | Powerstone Fracture | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Powerstone Fracture
trans-unit.target: 魔力石破裂

trans-unit.resname: BRO·112 | Powerstone Fracture | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice an artifact or creature.\nDestroy target creature or planeswalker.
trans-unit.target: 牺牲一个神器或生物，以作为施放此咒语的额外费用。 消灭目标生物或鹏洛客。

trans-unit.resname: BRO·112 | Powerstone Fracture | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Move! When the powerstone blows, that behemoth will be nothing but a hole in the ground."\n—Ashnod, to Hajar
trans-unit.target: 「快跑！魔力石一旦爆炸，就连那尊庞然大物都会只剩地面巨坑。」 ～阿士诺提醒哈札

trans-unit.resname: BRO·113 | Ravenous Gigamole | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Ravenous Gigamole
trans-unit.target: 贪食庞巨鼹

trans-unit.resname: BRO·113 | Ravenous Gigamole | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, mill three cards. You may put a creature card from among the cards milled this way into your hand. If you don't, put a +1/+1 counter on CARDNAME. (To mill a card, put the top card of your library into your graveyard.)
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，磨三张牌。你可以将以此法磨掉的一张生物牌置于你手上。若你未如此作，则在CARDNAME上放置一个+1/+1指示物。（磨一张牌的流程是将你牌库顶的牌置入你坟墓场。）

trans-unit.resname: BRO·114 | Thran Vigil | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Thran Vigil
trans-unit.target: 索蓝式警戒

trans-unit.resname: BRO·114 | Thran Vigil | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever one or more artifact and/or creature cards leave your graveyard during your turn, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.
trans-unit.target: 每当一张或数张神器和／或生物牌于你的回合中离开你坟墓场时，在目标由你操控的生物上放置一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.resname: BRO·114 | Thran Vigil | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Glacian built his automatons to last, and last they did, beyond even the Thran themselves.

trans-unit.resname: BRO·116 | Trench Stalker | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: It can hear a panicked heartbeat from a thousand paces away.
trans-unit.target: 它在千步开外就能听到慌乱心跳。

trans-unit.resname: BRO·172 | Blanchwood Prowler | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Blanchwood Prowler
trans-unit.target: 白木游掠灵

trans-unit.resname: BRO·172 | Blanchwood Prowler | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, mill three cards. You may put a land card from among the cards milled this way into your hand. If you don't, put a +1/+1 counter on CARDNAME. (To mill a card, put the top card of your library into your graveyard.)
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，磨三张牌。你可以将以此法磨掉的一张地牌置于你手上。若你未如此作，则在CARDNAME上放置一个+1/+1指示物。（磨一张牌的流程是将你牌库顶的牌置入你坟墓场。）

trans-unit.resname: BRO·173 | Burrowing Razormaw | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Burrowing Razormaw
trans-unit.target: 掘地锐喉兽

trans-unit.resname: BRO·173 | Burrowing Razormaw | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME dies, mill four cards. (Put the top four cards of your library into your graveyard.)
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME死去时，磨四张牌。（将你牌库顶的四张牌置入你的坟墓场。）

trans-unit.resname: BRO·173 | Burrowing Razormaw | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "That's odd. I don't remember seeing plans to dig a trench near here."\n—Lognell, Argivian scout
trans-unit.target: 「奇怪。我记得没准备在这挖壕沟啊。」 ～阿基夫斥候罗格聂

trans-unit.resname: BRO·174 | Bushwhack | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Bushwhack
trans-unit.target: 野林开路

trans-unit.resname: BRO·174 | Bushwhack | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Choose one —\n• Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.\n• Target creature you control fights target creature you don't control. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)
trans-unit.target: 选择一项～ •从你牌库中搜寻一张基本地牌，展示该牌，将它置于你手上，然后洗牌。 •目标由你操控的生物与目标不由你操控的生物互斗。（它们各向对方造成等同于本身力量的伤害。）

trans-unit.resname: BRO·175 | Citanul Stalwart | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Citanul Stalwart
trans-unit.target: 西坦努坚兵

trans-unit.resname: BRO·175 | Citanul Stalwart | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {T}, Tap an untapped artifact or creature you control: Add one mana of any color.
trans-unit.target: {T}，横置一个由你操控且未横置的神器或生物：加一点任意颜色的法术力。

trans-unit.resname: BRO·175 | Citanul Stalwart | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The endless grind of the Brothers' War had fouled Terisiare's land and blackened its skies. Argoth's defenders were determined to protect their isle from the same fate.
trans-unit.target: 兄弟之战不断延烧，令泰瑞西亚土地枯萎、天色蒙灰。亚格斯守护者决意保护自己的岛屿，以免落入同样境地。

trans-unit.resname: BRO·176 | Epic Confrontation | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Epic Confrontation
trans-unit.target: 壮绝对抗

trans-unit.resname: BRO·176 | Epic Confrontation | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Target creature you control gets +1/+2 until end of turn. It fights target creature you don't control. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)
trans-unit.target: 目标由你操控的生物得+1/+2直到回合结束。它与目标不由你操控的生物互斗。（它们各向对方造成等同于本身力量的伤害。）

trans-unit.resname: BRO·176 | Epic Confrontation | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "You've let yourself grow old, and your light is dimming. Shall we talk one last time, or must I slay you now?"\n—Mishra, to Urza
trans-unit.target: 「你让你自己衰老得太快啦，所以你的光减弱了。我们该好好谈这最后一次呢，还是我现在就杀了你？」 ～米斯拉嘲笑克撒

trans-unit.resname: BRO·177 | Fade from History | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Fade from History
trans-unit.target: 淡出历史

trans-unit.resname: BRO·177 | Fade from History | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Each player who controls an artifact or enchantment creates a 2/2 green Bear creature token. Then destroy all artifacts and enchantments.
trans-unit.target: 每位操控神器或结界的牌手各派出一个2/2绿色的熊衍生生物。然后消灭所有神器和结界。

trans-unit.resname: BRO·177 | Fade from History | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: After a long hibernation, Argoth began slowly recovering from the ravages of war.
trans-unit.target: 经过漫长的冬眠之后，亚格斯才开始从战事疮痍中缓慢复苏。

trans-unit.resname: BRO·178 | Fallaji Excavation | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Fallaji Excavation
trans-unit.target: 法拉吉掘古

trans-unit.resname: BRO·178 | Fallaji Excavation | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Create three tapped Powerstone tokens. You gain 3 life. (The tokens are artifacts with "{T}: Add {C}. This mana can't be spent to cast a nonartifact spell.")
trans-unit.target: 派出三个已横置的魔力石衍生物。你获得3点生命。（这些衍生物是具有「{T}，加{C}。此法术力不能用来施放非神器咒语」的神器。）

trans-unit.resname: BRO·178 | Fallaji Excavation | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Few relics excited Fallaji archaeologists more than Thran powerstones, which they called "eyes of the Old Ones."
trans-unit.target: 法拉吉考古学家从没遇到过像索蓝魔力石这样令他们欣喜若狂的遗宝。他们把这东西叫作「先贤之眼」。

trans-unit.resname: BRO·179 | Fauna Shaman | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Fauna Shaman
trans-unit.target: 动物群祭师

trans-unit.resname: BRO·179 | Fauna Shaman | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {G}, {T}, Discard a creature card: Search your library for a creature card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
trans-unit.target: {G}，{T}，弃掉一张生物牌：从你牌库中搜寻一张生物牌，展示该牌，将它置于你手上，然后洗牌。

trans-unit.resname: BRO·179 | Fauna Shaman | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I call on both predators and protectors, for now is a season of war."
trans-unit.target: 「所有猎食者与保护者都听我号令，如今战事将至。」

trans-unit.resname: BRO·180 | Fog of War | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Fog of War
trans-unit.target: 战争迷雾

trans-unit.resname: BRO·180 | Fog of War | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: You gain 1 life for each creature on the battlefield. Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn by creatures with power 3 or less.
trans-unit.target: 战场上每有一个生物，你便获得1点生命。于本回合中，防止力量等于或小于3的生物将造成之所有战斗伤害。

trans-unit.resname: BRO·180 | Fog of War | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: So thick was the fog on Argoth's shores that the brothers' forces passed within shouting distance of each other without realizing it.
trans-unit.target: 亚格斯沿岸的浓雾异常厚重，让两兄弟的部队在其中相向而行都未能察觉对方。

trans-unit.resname: BRO·181 | Gaea's Courser | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Gaea's Courser
trans-unit.target: 盖亚的骏马

trans-unit.resname: BRO·181 | Gaea's Courser | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME attacks, if there are three or more creature cards in your graveyard, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME攻击时，若你坟墓场中有三张或更多生物牌，则抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: BRO·181 | Gaea's Courser | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Even the leaves oppose your being here. What hope have you against nature's might?"
trans-unit.target: 「就连树叶也反对你的到来。你又拿什么来跟自然之力作对？」

trans-unit.resname: BRO·182 | Gaea's Gift | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Gaea's Gift
trans-unit.target: 盖亚赋礼

trans-unit.resname: BRO·182 | Gaea's Gift | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. It gains reach, trample, hexproof, and indestructible until end of turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control. Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)
trans-unit.target: 在目标由你操控的生物上放置一个+1/+1指示物。它获得延势、践踏、辟邪与不灭异能直到回合结束。（它不能成为由对手操控之咒语或异能的目标。伤害与注明「消灭」的效应不会将它消灭。）

trans-unit.resname: BRO·182 | Gaea's Gift | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: When it came to fighting an army of trees, even Mishra's best generals were stumped.
trans-unit.target: 当要与树木大军作战时，就连米斯拉最优秀的将领都一筹莫展。

trans-unit.resname: BRO·183 | Giant Growth | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Giant Growth
trans-unit.target: 变巨术

trans-unit.resname: BRO·183 | Giant Growth | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 目标生物得+3/+3直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: BRO·183 | Giant Growth | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Imagine being scared of pixies. Just smoosh them under your boot!"\n—Kerish, Urzan mechanist
trans-unit.target: 「就想象一下你被碧仙吓到的时候。直接抬脚把他们踩扁！」 ～克撒军机械师凯瑞许

trans-unit.resname: BRO·184 | Gnarlroot Pallbearer | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Gnarlroot Pallbearer
trans-unit.target: 虬根护柩木

trans-unit.resname: BRO·184 | Gnarlroot Pallbearer | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Trample\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of creature cards in your graveyard.
trans-unit.target: 践踏 当CARDNAME进战场时，目标生物得+X/+X直到回合结束，X为你坟墓场中的生物牌数量。

trans-unit.resname: BRO·184 | Gnarlroot Pallbearer | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The flames of war consumed most of Argoth's treefolk. Vengeance consumed the rest.
trans-unit.target: 亚格斯的树灵大多数都遭战争火焰吞噬。幸存的则被复仇怒火吞噬。

trans-unit.resname: BRO·185 | Gwenna, Eyes of Gaea | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Gwenna, Eyes of Gaea
trans-unit.target: 盖亚之眼关娜

trans-unit.resname: BRO·185 | Gwenna, Eyes of Gaea | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add two mana in any combination of colors. Spend this mana only to cast creature spells or activate abilities of a creature or creature card.\nWhenever you cast a creature spell with power 5 or greater, put a +1/+1 counter on CARDNAME and untap it.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加两点法术力，其颜色组合由你选择。此法术力只能用来施放生物咒语，或是起动生物或生物牌的异能。 每当你施放力量等于或大于5的生物咒语时，在CARDNAME上放置一个+1/+1指示物并重置它。

trans-unit.resname: BRO·186 | Hoarding Recluse | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Hoarding Recluse
trans-unit.target: 贮宝遁蛛

trans-unit.resname: BRO·186 | Hoarding Recluse | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Reach, deathtouch\nWhen CARDNAME dies, put up to one other target card from a graveyard on the bottom of its owner's library.
trans-unit.target: 延势，死触 当CARDNAME死去时，将至多另一张目标牌从坟墓场置于其拥有者的牌库底。

trans-unit.resname: BRO·186 | Hoarding Recluse | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: To the spiders of Argoth, thopters were just bigger, crunchier flies.
trans-unit.target: 对亚格斯的蜘蛛来说，扑翼机不过只是更大、更脆的苍蝇罢了。

trans-unit.resname: BRO·187 | Obstinate Baloth | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Obstinate Baloth
trans-unit.target: 顽强巴洛西

trans-unit.resname: BRO·187 | Obstinate Baloth | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you gain 4 life.\nIf a spell or ability an opponent controls causes you to discard CARDNAME, put it onto the battlefield instead of putting it into your graveyard.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，你获得4点生命。 如果某个由对手操控的咒语或异能使你弃掉CARDNAME，则改为将它放进战场，而非置入你的坟墓场。

trans-unit.resname: BRO·188 | Perimeter Patrol | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Perimeter Patrol
trans-unit.target: 防线巡卫

trans-unit.resname: BRO·188 | Perimeter Patrol | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever an artifact enters the battlefield under your control, CARDNAME gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个神器在你的操控下进战场时，CARDNAME得+1/+0直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: BRO·188 | Perimeter Patrol | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The Fallaji quickly learned that the Kher Ridges held too many caves and valleys to be surveyed from the air alone.
trans-unit.target: 法拉吉人很快就发现，喀尔山脊洞窟密布、峡谷错落，单从空中无法侦察全貌。

trans-unit.resname: BRO·189 | Sarinth Steelseeker | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Sarinth Steelseeker
trans-unit.target: 沙林斯觅钢客

trans-unit.resname: BRO·189 | Sarinth Steelseeker | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever an artifact enters the battlefield under your control, look at the top card of your library. If it's a land card, you may reveal it and put it into your hand. If you don't put the card into your hand, you may put it into your graveyard.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个神器在你的操控下进战场时，检视你的牌库顶牌。如果它是地牌，则你可以展示该牌并置于你手上。若你未将该牌置于你手上，则你可以将它置入你的坟墓场。

trans-unit.resname: BRO·189 | Sarinth Steelseeker | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "This metal junk is ugly, but it's got its uses."
trans-unit.target: 「这金属垃圾虽然丑陋，但也不是毫无用处。」

trans-unit.resname: BRO·190 | Shoot Down | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Shoot Down
trans-unit.target: 击坠

trans-unit.resname: BRO·190 | Shoot Down | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Exile target artifact, enchantment, or creature with flying.
trans-unit.target: 放逐目标神器，结界或具飞行异能的生物。

trans-unit.resname: BRO·190 | Shoot Down | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Gwenna stayed her hand only once, to save young Harbin's life—a mistake she would never repeat.
trans-unit.target: 关娜曾经为救年轻哈宾一命而没有痛下杀手～这错误她永远不会再犯第二次。

trans-unit.resname: BRO·191 | Tawnos's Tinkering | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Tawnos's Tinkering
trans-unit.target: 达硌士的打造

trans-unit.resname: BRO·191 | Tawnos's Tinkering | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Put two +1/+1 counters on target artifact, creature, or land you control. Untap that permanent. If it isn't a creature, it becomes a 0/0 creature in addition to its other types.
trans-unit.target: 在目标由你操控的神器，生物或地上放置两个+1/+1指示物。重置该永久物。如果它不是生物，则它成为0/0生物，且仍具有原本类别。

trans-unit.resname: BRO·191 | Tawnos's Tinkering | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: While his master tried to surpass nature, Tawnos aimed to capture its beauty.
trans-unit.target: 他的师傅试图超越自然，达硌士则致力于捕捉自然之美。

trans-unit.resname: BRO·192 | Teething Wurmlet | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Teething Wurmlet
trans-unit.target: 初牙幼龙

trans-unit.resname: BRO·192 | Teething Wurmlet | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME has deathtouch as long as you control three or more artifacts.\nWhenever an artifact enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 1 life. If this is the first time this ability has resolved this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 只要你操控三个或更多神器，CARDNAME便具有死触异能。 每当一个神器在你的操控下进战场时，你获得1点生命。如果这是此异能在本回合第一次的结算，则在CARDNAME上放置一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.resname: BRO·193 | Titania, Voice of Gaea | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Titania, Voice of Gaea
trans-unit.target: 盖亚之声泰坦尼亚

trans-unit.resname: BRO·193 | Titania, Voice of Gaea | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Reach\nWhenever one or more land cards are put into your graveyard from anywhere, you gain 2 life.\nAt the beginning of your upkeep, if there are four or more land cards in your graveyard and you both own and control CARDNAME and a land named Argoth, Sanctum of Nature, exile them, then meld them into Titania, Gaea Incarnate.
trans-unit.target: 延势 每当一张或数张地牌从任何区域进入你的坟墓场时，你获得2点生命。 在你的维持开始时，若你坟墓场中有四张或更多地牌，且你同时拥有并操控CARDNAME和一个名称为自然圣所亚格斯的地，则放逐后两者，然后将它们融合为盖亚化身泰坦尼亚。

trans-unit.resname: BRO·194 | Titania's Command | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Titania's Command
trans-unit.target: 泰坦尼亚的指命

trans-unit.resname: BRO·194 | Titania's Command | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source:
Choose two —
• Exile target player's graveyard. You gain 1 life for each card exiled this way.
• Search your library for up to two land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
• Create two 2/2 green Bear creature tokens.
• Put two +1/+1 counters on each creature you control.
trans-unit.target: 选择两项～ •放逐目标牌手的坟墓场。每以此法放逐一张牌，你便获得1点生命。 •从你牌库中搜寻至多两张地牌，将它们横置放进战场，然后洗牌。 •派出两个2/2绿色的熊衍生生物。 •在每个由你操控的生物上各放置两个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.resname: BRO·195 | Tomakul Honor Guard | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Tomakul Honor Guard
trans-unit.target: 托玛库仪队兵

trans-unit.resname: BRO·195 | Tomakul Honor Guard | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Ward {2} (Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {2}.)
trans-unit.target: 守护{2}（每当此生物成为由对手操控之咒语或异能的目标时，除非该牌手支付{2}，否则反击之。）

trans-unit.resname: BRO·195 | Tomakul Honor Guard | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: In the Great Desert, one law is enforced over all others: water belongs to all.
trans-unit.target: 在大沙漠有条至高无上的法律：水源共有。

trans-unit.resname: BRO·196 | Wasteful Harvest | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Wasteful Harvest
trans-unit.target: 断根收成

trans-unit.resname: BRO·196 | Wasteful Harvest | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Mill five cards. You may put a permanent card from among the cards milled this way into your hand. (To mill a card, put the top card of your library into your graveyard.)
trans-unit.target: 磨五张牌。你可以将以此法磨掉的一张永久物牌置于你手上。（磨一张牌的流程是将你牌库顶的牌置入你坟墓场。）

trans-unit.resname: BRO·196 | Wasteful Harvest | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Once the brothers discovered the pristine island of Argoth, the war came down to who could plunder it faster.
trans-unit.target: 当两兄弟发现亚格斯岛这片净土之后，战事就变成谁能抢得更快。

trans-unit.resname: BRO·197 | Boulderbranch Golem | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Boulderbranch Golem
trans-unit.target: 岩枝魔像

trans-unit.resname: BRO·197 | Boulderbranch Golem | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Prototype {3}{G} — 3/3 (You may cast this spell with different mana cost, color, and size. It keeps its abilities and types.)\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you gain life equal to its power.

trans-unit.resname: BRO·197 | Boulderbranch Golem | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Artifice is not the only form of creation."\n—Titania
trans-unit.target: 「打造奇械并非创造的唯一方式。」 ～泰坦尼亚

trans-unit.resname: BRO·198 | Cradle Clearcutter | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Cradle Clearcutter
trans-unit.target: 育苗地皆伐械

trans-unit.resname: BRO·198 | Cradle Clearcutter | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Prototype {2}{G} — 1/3 (You may cast this spell with different mana cost, color, and size. It keeps its abilities and types.)\n{T}: Add an amount of {G} equal to CARDNAME's power.

trans-unit.resname: BRO·198 | Cradle Clearcutter | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: A thousand years of growth, harvested in minutes.
trans-unit.target: 成长经千年，分秒收割净。

trans-unit.resname: BRO·199 | Haywire Mite | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Haywire Mite
trans-unit.target: 失控虫械

trans-unit.resname: BRO·199 | Haywire Mite | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME dies, you gain 2 life.\n{G}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Exile target noncreature artifact or noncreature enchantment.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME死去时，你获得2点生命。 {G}，牺牲CARDNAME：放逐目标非生物神器或非生物结界。

trans-unit.resname: BRO·199 | Haywire Mite | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "They're easy enough to squish, but they're a pain to wash out of a workbench."\n—Tergel, goblin explosioneer
trans-unit.target: 「它们虽然很容易碾碎，但从工作台上清干净很麻烦。」 ～鬼怪爆炸家特格尔

trans-unit.resname: BRO·200 | Iron-Craw Crusher | Card Name

trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, for each {U}{U} spent to cast it, draw a card.\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, for each {B}{B} spent to cast it, each opponent discards a card.\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, for each {R}{R} spent to cast it, it gets +1/+0 and gains trample and haste until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，施放它时每支付过一份{U}{U}，便抓一张牌。 当CARDNAME进战场时，施放它时每支付过一份{B}{B}，每位对手便各弃一张牌。 当CARDNAME进战场时，施放它时每支付过一份{R}{R}，直到回合结束，它便得+1/+0且获得践踏与敏捷异能。

trans-unit.target: 在你回合的战斗开始时，派出一个衍生物，此衍生物为佩带此武具之生物的复制品，但如果佩带此武具的生物是传奇，则该衍生物不是传奇。该衍生物获得敏捷异能。 佩带{5}

trans-unit.resname: BRR·20 | Howling Mine | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Howling Mine
trans-unit.target: 嚎叫的矿井

trans-unit.resname: BRR·20 | Howling Mine | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of each player's draw step, if CARDNAME is untapped, that player draws an additional card.
trans-unit.target: 在每位牌手的抓牌步骤开始时，若CARDNAME未横置，则该牌手额外抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: BRR·20 | Howling Mine | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The mine's riches never end, nor do the moans of the spirits doomed to haunt them.
trans-unit.target: 井内的矿藏从不枯竭，纠缠其间的鬼魂哭嚎也从不间断。

trans-unit.resname: BRR·21 | Ichor Wellspring | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Ichor Wellspring
trans-unit.target: 脓水涌泉

trans-unit.resname: BRR·21 | Ichor Wellspring | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield or is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场或从战场进入坟墓场时，抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: BRR·21 | Ichor Wellspring | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Our glorious infection has taken hold."\n—Elesh Norn, Grand Cenobite
trans-unit.target: 「我们光耀的感染已经掌握大局。」 ～大修道士艾蕾侬

trans-unit.resname: BRR·22 | Inspiring Statuary | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Inspiring Statuary
trans-unit.target: 启迪塑像

trans-unit.resname: BRR·22 | Inspiring Statuary | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Nonartifact spells you cast have improvise. (Your artifacts can help cast those spells. Each artifact you tap after you're done activating mana abilities pays for {1}.)
trans-unit.target: 你施放的非神器咒语具有拼造异能。（这些咒语能用你的神器来协助施放。你起动完法术力异能之后每横置一个神器，就能为此咒语支付{1}。）

trans-unit.resname: BRR·22 | Inspiring Statuary | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Ghirapur's most celebrated inventors have been immortalized in clockwork.
trans-unit.target: 金属塑像容貌相似，齿轮运转举止相同：吉拉波各位知名发明家藉此得以永生。

trans-unit.resname: BRR·23 | Ivory Tower | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Ivory Tower
trans-unit.target: 象牙塔

trans-unit.resname: BRR·23 | Ivory Tower | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, you gain X life, where X is the number of cards in your hand minus 4.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，你获得X点生命，X为你手牌的数量减4。

trans-unit.resname: BRR·23 | Ivory Tower | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Valuing scholarship above all else, the inhabitants of the Ivory Tower reward those who sacrifice power for knowledge.
trans-unit.target: 象牙塔中居民奉求知为毕生追索，在此处牺牲力量换取知识必有回报。

trans-unit.resname: BRR·24 | Jalum Tome | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Jalum Tome
trans-unit.target: 贾伦的巨著

trans-unit.resname: BRR·24 | Jalum Tome | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {2}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.
trans-unit.target: {2}，{T}：抓一张牌，然后弃一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: BRR·24 | Jalum Tome | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Most books simply deliver knowledge. This one expects some in return.
trans-unit.target: 大部分的书只是传达知识，但这一本还期待些回馈。

trans-unit.resname: BRR·25 | Journeyer's Kite | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Journeyer's Kite
trans-unit.target: 旅人风筝

trans-unit.resname: BRR·25 | Journeyer's Kite | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {3}, {T}: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
trans-unit.target: {3}，{T}：从你牌库中搜寻一张基本地牌，展示该牌，将它置于你手上，然后洗牌。

trans-unit.resname: BRR·25 | Journeyer's Kite | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "From the clouds, you can see as far as the distant horizon. It's a reminder of the infinite possibilities of everyday life."\n—Noboru, master kitemaker
trans-unit.target: 「从云际放眼望去，可以看到远方的地平线；也提醒着日常生活里有无限多的可能。」 ～风筝大师升

trans-unit.resname: BRR·26 | Keening Stone | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Keening Stone
trans-unit.target: 恸哭石

trans-unit.resname: BRR·26 | Keening Stone | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {5}, {T}: Target player mills X cards, where X is the number of cards in that player's graveyard.
trans-unit.target: {5}，{T}：目标牌手磨X张牌，X为该牌手坟墓场中牌的数量。

trans-unit.resname: BRR·26 | Keening Stone | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: As it spins, dead voices shriek in an ever-increasing cacophony, rending the mind asunder.
trans-unit.target: 它转动的尖削杂音有如不断增强的亡者之声，让心灵为之裂解。

trans-unit.resname: BRR·27 | Key to the City | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Key to the City
trans-unit.target: 入城钥匙

trans-unit.resname: BRR·27 | Key to the City | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {T}, Discard a card: Up to one target creature can't be blocked this turn.\nWhenever CARDNAME becomes untapped, you may pay {2}. If you do, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: {T}，弃一张牌：至多一个目标生物本回合不能被阻挡。 每当CARDNAME成为未横置时，你可以支付{2}。若你如此作，则抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: BRR·27 | Key to the City | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: It would be unfortunate if the key fell into the wrong hands.
trans-unit.target: 钥匙要落入不法之徒手中，那就糟了。

trans-unit.resname: BRR·28 | Liquimetal Coating | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Liquimetal Coating
trans-unit.target: 液金包覆

trans-unit.resname: BRR·28 | Liquimetal Coating | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {T}: Target permanent becomes an artifact in addition to its other types until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: {T}：直到回合结束，目标永久物成为神器，且仍具有原本类别。

trans-unit.resname: BRR·28 | Liquimetal Coating | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "They'll soon become accustomed to wearing skin that is not their own."\n—Elesh Norn, Grand Cenobite
trans-unit.target: 「他们很快就会习惯穿戴着不属于自己的皮肤。」 ～大修道士艾蕾侬

trans-unit.resname: BRR·29 | Lodestone Golem | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Lodestone Golem
trans-unit.target: 磁石魔像

trans-unit.resname: BRR·29 | Lodestone Golem | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Nonartifact spells cost {1} more to cast.
trans-unit.target: 非神器咒语增加{1}来施放。

trans-unit.resname: BRR·29 | Lodestone Golem | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Somehow it warps the Æther. It brings a strange weight, a blockade in the flow of spellcraft."\n—Noyan Dar, Tazeem lullmage
trans-unit.target: 「它以某种方式扭曲了乙太。它带来一种奇异的重量，产生的阻碍影响咒艺的流动。」 ～塔晋息法师诺言达

trans-unit.resname: BRR·30 | Mazemind Tome | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Mazemind Tome
trans-unit.target: 晦涩巨著

trans-unit.resname: BRR·30 | Mazemind Tome | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {T}, Put a page counter on CARDNAME: Scry 1.\n{2}, {T}, Put a page counter on CARDNAME: Draw a card.\nWhen there are four or more page counters on CARDNAME, exile it. If you do, you gain 4 life.
trans-unit.target: {T}，在CARDNAME上放置一个书页指示物：占卜1。 {2}，{T}，在CARDNAME上放置一个书页指示物：抓一张牌。 当CARDNAME上有四个或更多书页指示物时，将它放逐。若你如此作，则你获得4点生命。

trans-unit.resname: BRR·31 | Mesmeric Orb | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Mesmeric Orb
trans-unit.target: 催眠珠

trans-unit.resname: BRR·31 | Mesmeric Orb | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever a permanent becomes untapped, that permanent's controller mills a card.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个永久物成为未横置时，该永久物的操控者磨一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: BRR·31 | Mesmeric Orb | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: A step in one direction is two steps away from another.
trans-unit.target: 往正确的方向踏一步，便会比往其他方向多出两步之远。

trans-unit.resname: BRR·32 | Millstone | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Millstone
trans-unit.target: 研磨石轮

trans-unit.resname: BRR·32 | Millstone | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {2}, {T}: Target player mills two cards.
trans-unit.target: {2}，{T}：目标牌手磨两张牌。

trans-unit.resname: BRR·32 | Millstone | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Minds, like mountains, are never so grand and mighty that they can't be reduced to dust.
trans-unit.target: 头脑就像山脉一般，无论多么雄伟宏大，都依旧可以化为尘埃。

trans-unit.resname: BRR·33 | Mind's Eye | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Mind's Eye
trans-unit.target: 灵眼

trans-unit.resname: BRR·33 | Mind's Eye | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever an opponent draws a card, you may pay {1}. If you do, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 每当任一对手抓一张牌时，你可以支付{1}。若你如此作，则抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: BRR·33 | Mind's Eye | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Ideas drift like petals on the wind. I have only to lift my face to the breeze."
trans-unit.target: 「灵思如风中花瓣般飘飞；我只需面朝着微风。」

trans-unit.resname: BRR·34 | Mishra's Bauble | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Mishra's Bauble
trans-unit.target: 米斯拉的饰品

trans-unit.resname: BRR·34 | Mishra's Bauble | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {T}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Look at the top card of target player's library. Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
trans-unit.target: {T}，牺牲CARDNAME：检视目标牌手的牌库顶牌。在下一个回合维持开始时，抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: BRR·34 | Mishra's Bauble | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Arcum is a babbling fool! Phyrexian technology is our greatest blessing. Take this delightful trinket for instance . . ."\n—Heidar, Rimewind master
trans-unit.target: 「阿肯真是爱唠叨的蠢材！非瑞克西亚的技术是上天送来的宝贵礼物。比如这精致的饰品…」 ～霜风会首领亥达

trans-unit.resname: BRR·35 | Mox Amber | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Mox Amber
trans-unit.target: 琥珀玛珂

trans-unit.resname: BRR·35 | Mox Amber | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add one mana of any color among legendary creatures and planeswalkers you control.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加一点法术力，其颜色为由你操控之传奇生物和鹏洛客所具有的任一颜色。

trans-unit.resname: BRR·35 | Mox Amber | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: A moment in time made tangible, it has the power to realize epic visions.
trans-unit.target: 历史时刻具化成物，它拥有能实现壮绝憧憬的力量。

trans-unit.resname: BRR·36 | Mystic Forge | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Mystic Forge
trans-unit.target: 神秘熔炉

trans-unit.resname: BRR·36 | Mystic Forge | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: You may look at the top card of your library any time.\nYou may cast artifact spells and colorless spells from the top of your library.\n{T}, Pay 1 life: Exile the top card of your library.
trans-unit.target: 你可以随时检视你的牌库顶牌。 你可以从你的牌库顶施放神器咒语和无色咒语。 {T}，支付1点生命：放逐你的牌库顶牌。

trans-unit.resname: BRR·37 | Ornithopter | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Ornithopter
trans-unit.target: 扑翼机

trans-unit.resname: BRR·37 | Ornithopter | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.resname: BRR·37 | Ornithopter | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Once a year, the skies over Paliano fill with the flying machines of those who hope to be taken on as pupils by the artificer Muzzio.
trans-unit.target: 帕兰诺城每年都会出现一次无数飞行装置漫天飞舞的盛况，这些器械打造者渴望能以此得到神器师穆齐奥的青睐，被他收为学徒。

trans-unit.resname: BRR·38 | Perilous Vault | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Perilous Vault
trans-unit.target: 险恶贮窖

trans-unit.resname: BRR·38 | Perilous Vault | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {5}, {T}, Exile CARDNAME: Exile all nonland permanents.
trans-unit.target: {5}，{T}，放逐CARDNAME：放逐所有非地永久物。

trans-unit.resname: BRR·38 | Perilous Vault | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The spirit dragon Ugin arranged the hedrons of Zendikar to direct leylines of energy. To disrupt one is to unleash devastation and chaos.
trans-unit.target: 赞迪卡每一块晶石的位置都经过灵龙乌金的仔细调整，以引导地脉之中的能量流动。打乱其中一块就会引发灾难与混乱。

trans-unit.resname: BRR·39 | Phyrexian Processor | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Phyrexian Processor
trans-unit.target: 非瑞克西亚处理机

trans-unit.resname: BRR·39 | Phyrexian Processor | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: As CARDNAME enters the battlefield, pay any amount of life.\n{4}, {T}: Create an X/X black Phyrexian Minion creature token, where X is the life paid as CARDNAME entered the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: 于CARDNAME进战场时，支付任意数量的生命。 {4}，{T}：派出一个X/X黑色非瑞人／奴仆衍生生物，X为于CARDNAME进战场时所支付的生命数量。

trans-unit.resname: BRR·40 | Phyrexian Revoker | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Phyrexian Revoker
trans-unit.target: 非瑞克西亚断念妖

trans-unit.resname: BRR·40 | Phyrexian Revoker | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: As CARDNAME enters the battlefield, choose a nonland card name.\nActivated abilities of sources with the chosen name can't be activated.
trans-unit.target: 于CARDNAME进战场时，选择一个非地牌的名称。 具有该名称之来源的起动式异能都不能起动。

trans-unit.resname: BRR·40 | Phyrexian Revoker | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "To be in the presence of a revoker is to be truly alone."\n—Kara Vrist, Neurok agent
trans-unit.target: 「在断念妖的面前才是真正的孤独。」 ～纽若克密探凯拉黎

trans-unit.resname: BRR·41 | Platinum Angel | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Platinum Angel
trans-unit.target: 白金天使

trans-unit.resname: BRR·41 | Platinum Angel | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nYou can't lose the game and your opponents can't win the game.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 你这盘游戏不会输，对手也不会赢。

trans-unit.resname: BRR·41 | Platinum Angel | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: She is the apex of the artificer's craft, the spirit of the divine called out of base metal.
trans-unit.target: 她是神器师手艺的极致，以贱金属呼唤出的神性精魂。

trans-unit.resname: BRR·42 | Precursor Golem | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Precursor Golem
trans-unit.target: 先驱魔像

trans-unit.resname: BRR·42 | Precursor Golem | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, create two 3/3 colorless Golem artifact creature tokens.\nWhenever a player casts an instant or sorcery spell that targets only a single Golem, that player copies that spell for each other Golem that spell could target. Each copy targets a different one of those Golems.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，派出两个3/3无色魔像衍生神器生物。 每当任一牌手施放仅以单一魔像为目标的瞬间或法术咒语时，该咒语每能以一个其他的魔像为目标，该牌手便将该咒语复制一次。每个复制品都要以这些魔像之一为目标，且不能重复选择。

trans-unit.resname: BRR·43 | Pristine Talisman | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Pristine Talisman
trans-unit.target: 纯净饰符

trans-unit.resname: BRR·43 | Pristine Talisman | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {C}. You gain 1 life.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加{C}。你获得1点生命。

trans-unit.resname: BRR·43 | Pristine Talisman | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Tools and artisans can be destroyed, but the act of creation is inviolate."\n—Elspeth Tirel
trans-unit.target: 「工具与工匠可能会毁灭，但创作此行为将生生不息。」 ～艾紫培提瑞

trans-unit.resname: BRR·44 | Psychosis Crawler | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Psychosis Crawler
trans-unit.target: 变态爬虫

trans-unit.resname: BRR·44 | Psychosis Crawler | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME's power and toughness are each equal to the number of cards in your hand.\nWhenever you draw a card, each opponent loses 1 life.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME的力量和防御力各等同于你的手牌数量。 每当你抓一张牌时，每位对手各失去1点生命。

trans-unit.resname: BRR·44 | Psychosis Crawler | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "If that brain can't figure out the secret of the serum, then add more brains."\n—Rhmir, Hand of the Augur
trans-unit.target: 「如果那脑子无法理解浆液的秘密，就多加几个脑子。」 ～卜算手信众卢米

trans-unit.resname: BRR·45 | Quicksilver Amulet | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Quicksilver Amulet
trans-unit.target: 水银护身符

trans-unit.resname: BRR·45 | Quicksilver Amulet | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {4}, {T}: You may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: {4}，{T}：你可以将一张生物牌从你手上放进战场。

trans-unit.resname: BRR·45 | Quicksilver Amulet | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Those who examine the amulet too closely have been known to become part of its ornate carvings.
trans-unit.target: 据知太贴近把玩这护身符的人，会变成其上华丽雕饰的一部分。

trans-unit.resname: BRR·46 | Quietus Spike | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Quietus Spike
trans-unit.target: 封喉刺

trans-unit.resname: BRR·46 | Quietus Spike | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Equipped creature has deathtouch.\nWhenever equipped creature deals combat damage to a player, that player loses half their life, rounded up.\nEquip {3}

trans-unit.resname: BRR·47 | Ramos, Dragon Engine | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Ramos, Dragon Engine
trans-unit.target: 龙形引擎瑞莫斯

trans-unit.resname: BRR·47 | Ramos, Dragon Engine | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhenever you cast a spell, put a +1/+1 counter on CARDNAME for each of that spell's colors.\nRemove five +1/+1 counters from Ramos: Add {W}{W}{U}{U}{B}{B}{R}{R}{G}{G}. Activate only once each turn.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 每当你施放咒语时，该咒语每有一种颜色，便在CARDNAME上放置一个+1/+1指示物。 从瑞莫斯上移去五个+1/+1指示物：加{W}{W}{U}{U}{B}{B}{R}{R}{G}{G}。每回合只能起动一次。

trans-unit.resname: BRR·48 | Runechanter's Pike | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Runechanter's Pike
trans-unit.target: 符颂师长矛

trans-unit.resname: BRR·48 | Runechanter's Pike | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Equipped creature has first strike and gets +X/+0, where X is the number of instant and sorcery cards in your graveyard.\nEquip {2}
trans-unit.target: 佩带此武具的生物具有先攻异能且得+X/+0，X为你坟墓场中瞬间与法术牌的数量加总。 佩带{2}

trans-unit.resname: BRR·48 | Runechanter's Pike | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: As sharp as its bearer's words of faith.
trans-unit.target: 如持用者的信念誓言般锋利。

trans-unit.resname: BRR·49 | Scrap Trawler | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Scrap Trawler
trans-unit.target: 废铁打捞械

trans-unit.resname: BRR·49 | Scrap Trawler | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME or another artifact you control is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, return to your hand target artifact card in your graveyard with lesser mana value.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME或另一个由你操控的神器从战场进入坟墓场时，将目标在你坟墓场中且法术力值小于前述神器的神器牌移回你手上。

trans-unit.resname: BRR·50 | Sculpting Steel | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Sculpting Steel
trans-unit.target: 塑型钢

trans-unit.resname: BRR·50 | Sculpting Steel | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: You may have CARDNAME enter the battlefield as a copy of any artifact on the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使CARDNAME当成战场上任一神器的复制品来进入战场。

trans-unit.resname: BRR·50 | Sculpting Steel | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: An artificer once dropped one in a vault full of coins. She has yet to find it.

trans-unit.source: {3}, {T}: Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a land card. CARDNAME deals damage equal to the number of nonland cards revealed this way to any target. If the revealed land card was a Mountain, CARDNAME deals double that damage instead. Put the revealed cards on the bottom of your library in any order.
trans-unit.target: {3}，{T}：从你牌库顶开始展示牌，直到展示出一张地牌为止。CARDNAME对任意一个目标造成伤害，其数量等同于以此法展示之非地牌数量。如果展示出的地牌是山脉，则改为CARDNAME造成两倍的伤害。将所展示的牌以任意顺序置于你牌库底。

trans-unit.resname: BRR·82 | Helm of the Host | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Helm of the Host
trans-unit.target: 军团之盔

trans-unit.resname: BRR·82 | Helm of the Host | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of combat on your turn, create a token that's a copy of equipped creature, except the token isn't legendary if equipped creature is legendary. That token gains haste.\nEquip {5}
trans-unit.target: 在你回合的战斗开始时，派出一个衍生物，此衍生物为佩带此武具之生物的复制品，但如果佩带此武具的生物是传奇，则该衍生物不是传奇。该衍生物获得敏捷异能。 佩带{5}

trans-unit.resname: BRR·83 | Howling Mine | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Howling Mine
trans-unit.target: 嚎叫的矿井

trans-unit.resname: BRR·83 | Howling Mine | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of each player's draw step, if CARDNAME is untapped, that player draws an additional card.
trans-unit.target: 在每位牌手的抓牌步骤开始时，若CARDNAME未横置，则该牌手额外抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: BRR·83 | Howling Mine | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The Sardian dwarves have let superstition override common sense. There's plenty of ore left in the mountain, and we mustn't let it go to waste."\n—Last dispatch of Bolgon, Argivian surveyor
trans-unit.target: 「沙地亚矮人迷信而不从常理。山中尚余许多矿石，决计不能浪费。」 ～阿基夫勘探者波尔贡最后的电文

trans-unit.resname: BRR·84 | Ichor Wellspring | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Ichor Wellspring
trans-unit.target: 脓水涌泉

trans-unit.resname: BRR·84 | Ichor Wellspring | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield or is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场或从战场进入坟墓场时，抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: BRR·84 | Ichor Wellspring | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Should a single drop take hold, the oil begins to consume organic tissue and will multiply until it overwhelms the host."\n—Yawgmoth, collected writings
trans-unit.target: 「只要沾到一滴，烁油就会开始吞噬有机组织、持续增生，最终彻底击垮宿主。」 ～约格莫夫，著作集

trans-unit.resname: BRR·85 | Inspiring Statuary | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Inspiring Statuary
trans-unit.target: 启迪塑像

trans-unit.resname: BRR·85 | Inspiring Statuary | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Nonartifact spells you cast have improvise. (Your artifacts can help cast those spells. Each artifact you tap after you're done activating mana abilities pays for {1}.)
trans-unit.target: 你施放的非神器咒语具有拼造异能。（这些咒语能用你的神器来协助施放。你起动完法术力异能之后每横置一个神器，就能为此咒语支付{1}。）

trans-unit.resname: BRR·85 | Inspiring Statuary | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "In the early days, Urza's wondrous automatons were seen as symbols of hope and courage."\n—*The Antiquities War*
trans-unit.target: 「早期，克撒的神奇自动机械被当作希望与勇气的象征。」 ～*《古文明之战》*

trans-unit.resname: BRR·86 | Ivory Tower | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Ivory Tower
trans-unit.target: 象牙塔

trans-unit.resname: BRR·86 | Ivory Tower | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, you gain X life, where X is the number of cards in your hand minus 4.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，你获得X点生命，X为你手牌的数量减4。

trans-unit.resname: BRR·86 | Ivory Tower | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Ringed by white stone, Terisia was a city of scholarship and knowledge, where magic promised a brighter future to a world devoured by artifice."\n—*The Antiquities War*
trans-unit.target: 「泰瑞西亚周遭白石环绕，乃是求学与知识之城，此处的魔法允诺为遭奇械吞噬的世界带来光明未来。」 ～*《古文明之战》</>

trans-unit.resname: BRR·87 | Jalum Tome | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Jalum Tome
trans-unit.target: 贾伦的巨著

trans-unit.resname: BRR·87 | Jalum Tome | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {2}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.
trans-unit.target: {2}，{T}：抓一张牌，然后弃一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: BRR·87 | Jalum Tome | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "These glyphs describe a Thran device capable of controlling a machine army, but the dimensions make no sense. It's nearly the size of the Null Moon."\n—Urza, diary
trans-unit.target: 「这些图符讲述的是能够操控整支机械军队的索蓝装置，但上面写的尺寸并不合理。它就跟虚无之月一般大。」 ～克撒，随身日记

trans-unit.resname: BRR·88 | Journeyer's Kite | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Journeyer's Kite
trans-unit.target: 旅人风筝

trans-unit.resname: BRR·88 | Journeyer's Kite | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {3}, {T}: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
trans-unit.target: {3}，{T}：从你牌库中搜寻一张基本地牌，展示该牌，将它置于你手上，然后洗牌。

trans-unit.resname: BRR·88 | Journeyer's Kite | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Measure the angles carefully. Note the gauge of the paper. By your sixth birthday, I expect a flying prototype."\n—Tawnos, letter to Harbin
trans-unit.target: 「仔细测量角度。记录纸张厚度。我期望到你六岁生日的时候，能看到一架能飞的试作品。」 ～达硌士，写给哈宾的信

trans-unit.resname: BRR·89 | Keening Stone | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Keening Stone
trans-unit.target: 恸哭石

trans-unit.resname: BRR·89 | Keening Stone | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {5}, {T}: Target player mills X cards, where X is the number of cards in that player's graveyard.
trans-unit.target: {5}，{T}：目标牌手磨X张牌，X为该牌手坟墓场中牌的数量。

trans-unit.resname: BRR·89 | Keening Stone | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The new prototype utilizing a rotational axis is marvelously effective: it makes me want to tear my own ears off."\n—Ashnod, to her assistants
trans-unit.target: 「这台用旋转轴制成的试作品简直太有效了：我现在恨不得把自己耳朵扯下来。」 ～阿士诺告诉助手

trans-unit.resname: BRR·90 | Key to the City | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Key to the City
trans-unit.target: 入城钥匙

trans-unit.resname: BRR·90 | Key to the City | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {T}, Discard a card: Up to one target creature can't be blocked this turn.\nWhenever CARDNAME becomes untapped, you may pay {2}. If you do, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: {T}，弃一张牌：至多一个目标生物本回合不能被阻挡。 每当CARDNAME成为未横置时，你可以支付{2}。若你如此作，则抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: BRR·90 | Key to the City | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Presented to the Chief Artificer in recognition of his unparalleled service to Yotia."\n—Rusted plaque
trans-unit.target: 「铸物卿身居佑天多年，为国尽心戮力嘉慧良多。特颁此状，谨致谢忱。」 ～锈蚀的牌匾

trans-unit.resname: BRR·91 | Liquimetal Coating | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Liquimetal Coating
trans-unit.target: 液金包覆

trans-unit.resname: BRR·91 | Liquimetal Coating | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {T}: Target permanent becomes an artifact in addition to its other types until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: {T}：直到回合结束，目标永久物成为神器，且仍具有原本类别。

trans-unit.resname: BRR·91 | Liquimetal Coating | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "We've had a breakthrough on the fifth iteration. The subject's skin was entirely replaced within an hour, and he survived a full day after that!"\n—Ashnod, to Mishra
trans-unit.target: 「我们在第五次试验时有了突破。实验对象的皮肤在一小时内就被完全取代，且他在此之后还活了一整天！」 ～阿士诺告诉米斯拉

trans-unit.resname: BRR·92 | Lodestone Golem | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Lodestone Golem
trans-unit.target: 磁石魔像

trans-unit.resname: BRR·92 | Lodestone Golem | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Nonartifact spells cost {1} more to cast.
trans-unit.target: 非神器咒语增加{1}来施放。

trans-unit.resname: BRR·92 | Lodestone Golem | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Progress update: the problem of the slagheap blocking the entrance seems to have solved itself."\n—Mine supervisor's report
trans-unit.target: 「进度更新：矿渣阻挡出入口的问题似乎自行解决了。」 ～矿井监工报告

trans-unit.resname: BRR·93 | Mazemind Tome | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Mazemind Tome
trans-unit.target: 晦涩巨著

trans-unit.resname: BRR·93 | Mazemind Tome | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {T}, Put a page counter on CARDNAME: Scry 1.\n{2}, {T}, Put a page counter on CARDNAME: Draw a card.\nWhen there are four or more page counters on CARDNAME, exile it. If you do, you gain 4 life.
trans-unit.target: {T}，在CARDNAME上放置一个书页指示物：占卜1。 {2}，{T}，在CARDNAME上放置一个书页指示物：抓一张牌。 当CARDNAME上有四个或更多书页指示物时，将它放逐。若你如此作，则你获得4点生命。

trans-unit.resname: BRR·94 | Mesmeric Orb | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Mesmeric Orb
trans-unit.target: 催眠珠

trans-unit.resname: BRR·94 | Mesmeric Orb | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever a permanent becomes untapped, that permanent's controller mills a card.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个永久物成为未横置时，该永久物的操控者磨一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: BRR·94 | Mesmeric Orb | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I now believe the strange orb was some kind of Thran security device. Supporting this theory, I can no longer recall where I found it."\n—Tocasia, journal entry
trans-unit.target: 「我现在相信这颗奇异法珠是某种索蓝安全装置。能佐证这想法的依据是，我已经想不起来是在哪找到它的了。」 ～托卡西雅，日志一笔

trans-unit.resname: BRR·95 | Millstone | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Millstone
trans-unit.target: 研磨石轮

trans-unit.resname: BRR·95 | Millstone | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {2}, {T}: Target player mills two cards.
trans-unit.target: {2}，{T}：目标牌手磨两张牌。

trans-unit.resname: BRR·95 | Millstone | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "In the lean months, communities lived off a bitterwheat berry so tough that its flour contained more millstone than grain."\n—*On the Early History of Keld*
trans-unit.target: 「在困苦岁月中，民众依靠一种苦麦仁过活。这种麦仁异常坚硬，它经研磨而成的面粉当中，磨石的数量甚至比麦粒还多。」 ～*《凯尔顿前史》*

trans-unit.resname: BRR·96 | Mind's Eye | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Mind's Eye
trans-unit.target: 灵眼

trans-unit.resname: BRR·96 | Mind's Eye | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever an opponent draws a card, you may pay {1}. If you do, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 每当任一对手抓一张牌时，你可以支付{1}。若你如此作，则抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: BRR·96 | Mind's Eye | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I sit and I think of Lat-Nam, of the azure waves white with froth, suspended over the shore. I see the energy there and I call it here."\n—Hurkyl, meditation notes
trans-unit.target: 「我正姿端坐，思绪回到了拉特南学院，脑海净是翻着洁白浪花的碧蓝海浪冲刷滩头的安稳景象。就在其中，我看到了能量所在，于是我将之召唤至此。」 ～河鼓，冥思纪录

trans-unit.resname: BRR·97 | Mishra's Bauble | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Mishra's Bauble
trans-unit.target: 米斯拉的饰品

trans-unit.resname: BRR·97 | Mishra's Bauble | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {T}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Look at the top card of target player's library. Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
trans-unit.target: {T}，牺牲CARDNAME：检视目标牌手的牌库顶牌。在下一个回合维持开始时，抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: BRR·97 | Mishra's Bauble | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The secrets of my great-uncle's heirloom lie in the world where it was forged: the grease-stained wastes of Phyrexia."\n—Jarsyl, diary
trans-unit.target: 「我伯祖父的传世秘密就落在它原本铸造出来的世界：非瑞克西亚满是油污的荒野。」 ～贾索，随身日记

trans-unit.resname: BRR·98 | Mox Amber | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Mox Amber
trans-unit.target: 琥珀玛珂

trans-unit.resname: BRR·98 | Mox Amber | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add one mana of any color among legendary creatures and planeswalkers you control.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加一点法术力，其颜色为由你操控之传奇生物和鹏洛客所具有的任一颜色。

trans-unit.resname: BRR·98 | Mox Amber | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "A crystallized moment in time from the Mending Era, first discovered during the Ice Age. A temporal conundrum, even to the great scholar himself."\n—*The Discoveries of Feldon*
trans-unit.target: 「来自愈合年代的结晶时刻，却是在冰雪时代首先被人发现。这一时间难题，就连伟大学者自己也百思不得其解。」 ～*《费顿发现录》*

trans-unit.resname: BRR·99 | Mystic Forge | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Mystic Forge
trans-unit.target: 神秘熔炉

trans-unit.resname: BRR·99 | Mystic Forge | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: You may look at the top card of your library any time.\nYou may cast artifact spells and colorless spells from the top of your library.\n{T}, Pay 1 life: Exile the top card of your library.
trans-unit.target: 你可以随时检视你的牌库顶牌。 你可以从你的牌库顶施放神器咒语和无色咒语。 {T}，支付1点生命：放逐你的牌库顶牌。

trans-unit.resname: BRR·100 | Ornithopter | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Ornithopter
trans-unit.target: 扑翼机

trans-unit.resname: BRR·100 | Ornithopter | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.resname: BRR·100 | Ornithopter | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source:
"Without Urza's ingenuity, the wings
would never have borne weight. Without
Mishra's courage, we would never have
known the machine's true potential. I hope this persuades them to work together more."
—Tocasia, journal entry
trans-unit.target: 「倘若没有克撒的才智，翅翼将永不能承重。倘若没有米斯拉的勇气，我们永远无从知晓扑翼机的真正潜能。我希望这一成果能说服他们多加合作。」 ～托卡西雅，日志一笔

trans-unit.resname: BRR·101 | Perilous Vault | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Perilous Vault
trans-unit.target: 险恶贮窖

trans-unit.resname: BRR·101 | Perilous Vault | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {5}, {T}, Exile CARDNAME: Exile all nonland permanents.
trans-unit.target: {5}，{T}，放逐CARDNAME：放逐所有非地永久物。

trans-unit.resname: BRR·101 | Perilous Vault | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "As the years passed, Urza turned his focus from the Thran to worlds beyond his own, seeking any spell or technology that might break the Phyrexian scourge."\n—*Urza: From Prodigy to Planeswalker*
trans-unit.target: 「随着岁月流逝，克撒逐渐超越索蓝放眼其他世界，寻找能够平息非瑞克西亚灾祸的咒文或技术。」 ～*《克撒：逸展鹏程》*

trans-unit.resname: BRR·102 | Phyrexian Processor | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Phyrexian Processor
trans-unit.target: 非瑞克西亚处理机

trans-unit.resname: BRR·102 | Phyrexian Processor | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: As CARDNAME enters the battlefield, pay any amount of life.\n{4}, {T}: Create an X/X black Phyrexian Minion creature token, where X is the life paid as CARDNAME entered the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: 于CARDNAME进战场时，支付任意数量的生命。 {4}，{T}：派出一个X/X黑色非瑞人／奴仆衍生生物，X为于CARDNAME进战场时所支付的生命数量。

trans-unit.resname: BRR·103 | Phyrexian Revoker | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Phyrexian Revoker
trans-unit.target: 非瑞克西亚断念妖

trans-unit.resname: BRR·103 | Phyrexian Revoker | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: As CARDNAME enters the battlefield, choose a nonland card name.\nActivated abilities of sources with the chosen name can't be activated.
trans-unit.target: 于CARDNAME进战场时，选择一个非地牌的名称。 具有该名称之来源的起动式异能都不能起动。

trans-unit.resname: BRR·103 | Phyrexian Revoker | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "These skittering creatures were created to hunt the one true threat to Phyrexia: dissent."\n—Venser, journal
trans-unit.target: 「创造这种迅捷生物的真正目的，在于猎捕非瑞克西亚唯一的真正威胁：异见。」 ～凡瑟，日志纪录

trans-unit.resname: BRR·104 | Platinum Angel | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Platinum Angel
trans-unit.target: 白金天使

trans-unit.resname: BRR·104 | Platinum Angel | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nYou can't lose the game and your opponents can't win the game.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 你这盘游戏不会输，对手也不会赢。

trans-unit.resname: BRR·104 | Platinum Angel | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Serra built angels from the spirits of fallen warriors, but I believe a more mundane power source might suffice."\n—Karn
trans-unit.target: 「撒拉利用逝去战士的灵魂来塑造天使，但我认为更平凡的力量来源就已足够。」 ～卡恩

trans-unit.resname: BRR·105 | Precursor Golem | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Precursor Golem
trans-unit.target: 先驱魔像

trans-unit.resname: BRR·105 | Precursor Golem | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, create two 3/3 colorless Golem artifact creature tokens.\nWhenever a player casts an instant or sorcery spell that targets only a single Golem, that player copies that spell for each other Golem that spell could target. Each copy targets a different one of those Golems.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，派出两个3/3无色魔像衍生神器生物。 每当任一牌手施放仅以单一魔像为目标的瞬间或法术咒语时，该咒语每能以一个其他的魔像为目标，该牌手便将该咒语复制一次。每个复制品都要以这些魔像之一为目标，且不能重复选择。

trans-unit.resname: BRR·106 | Pristine Talisman | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Pristine Talisman
trans-unit.target: 纯净饰符

trans-unit.resname: BRR·106 | Pristine Talisman | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {C}. You gain 1 life.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加{C}。你获得1点生命。

trans-unit.resname: BRR·106 | Pristine Talisman | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "A rakalite core paired with a powerstone matrix has significantly increased the healing effects of my original amulet design."\n—Urza, research notes
trans-unit.target: 「拉卡石核心配上魔力石间质，这样就能显著增强我原本护身符设计的疗伤效果。」 ～克撒，研究纪录

trans-unit.resname: BRR·107 | Psychosis Crawler | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Psychosis Crawler
trans-unit.target: 变态爬虫

trans-unit.resname: BRR·107 | Psychosis Crawler | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME's power and toughness are each equal to the number of cards in your hand.\nWhenever you draw a card, each opponent loses 1 life.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME的力量和防御力各等同于你的手牌数量。 每当你抓一张牌时，每位对手各失去1点生命。

trans-unit.resname: BRR·107 | Psychosis Crawler | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Perhaps drawing the impossible monster will lessen the burden my memory must bear."\n—Jarsyl, diary
trans-unit.target: 「也许画出这难喻怪兽，就能够减轻我记忆不得不承受之重。」 ～贾索，随身日记

trans-unit.resname: BRR·108 | Quicksilver Amulet | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Quicksilver Amulet
trans-unit.target: 水银护身符

trans-unit.resname: BRR·108 | Quicksilver Amulet | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {4}, {T}: You may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: {4}，{T}：你可以将一张生物牌从你手上放进战场。

trans-unit.resname: BRR·108 | Quicksilver Amulet | Flavor Text
